typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as short,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as short,
		EAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(Insert_date = currentTimestamp(),
		Amount = ESalary,
		Upper_Name = upper(EName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
